Lines.Speaker: Elven Trader
Lines.Text: You smell of road and woodsmoke. Not Dheowryth steel. Good. My shipment rots until the gate opens.

Choices.Text: You seem well-off for a hated kin.

Lines.Speaker: Elven Trader
Lines.Text: Take this note to the Clerk. I’ll owe you one when the city remembers profit.

Lines.Speaker: Elven Trader
Lines.Text: Hatred is a tax. We pay it in coin—until someone else pays in blood. Go swiftly.
